thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Zach (Portsmouth, NH) was a tremendous help in quickly resolving my issue. Friendly greeting, on the ball, and efficient. I am very particular where I take my cars. Town Fair is the only automotive "chain-store" that I use. Great prices, great service. I tell everyone to go there.
